source.title: Agent SDK overview - Claude Docs
source.description: Introduction to building production-ready agents with TypeScript or Python SDKs, covering authentication, Claude Code features (context management, tools, permissions), MCP extensibility, subagents, hooks, skills, plugins, and partner branding.

source.title: Agent SDK reference - Python - Claude Docs
source.description: Complete Python Agent SDK API reference documenting query(), ClaudeSDKClient, tool decorator, create_sdk_mcp_server(), configuration types, ClaudeAgentOptions, hooks, message types, content blocks, error classes, and built-in tool schemas.

source.title: Handling Permissions - Claude Docs
source.description: Permission control via modes (default, acceptEdits, bypassPermissions), canUseTool callback for runtime approval, hooks for programmatic control, permission rules, flow evaluation order, mode-specific behaviours, best practices.

source.title: Session Management - Claude Docs
source.description: Session management including capturing session IDs from init messages, resuming conversations with preserved context, forking sessions to create branches versus continuing linearly, and comparison of forking behaviours.

source.title: Hosting the Agent SDK - Claude Docs
source.description: Production deployment architecture for Agent SDK with four deployment patterns (ephemeral, long-running, hybrid, single-container sessions), sandbox provider comparisons (Cloudflare, Modal, E2B, Fly, Vercel), container requirements, communication, costs, and monitoring.

source.title: Modifying system prompts - Claude Docs
source.description: Four system prompt modification methods: CLAUDE.md project files, output styles, claude_code preset with append option, custom prompts; settingSources configuration requirements, persistence and reusability comparison, use cases and best practices.

source.title: Streaming Input - Claude Docs
source.description: Two input modes: streaming input (recommended) with AsyncGenerator, image uploads, queued messages, hooks, interruptions, context persistence; single message input for one-shot queries with session resuming, benefits, limitations, use cases.

source.title: Custom Tools - Claude Docs
source.description: Building custom tools with createSdkMcpServer and tool decorator, type-safe schemas using Zod or JSON Schema, tool naming format, allowedTools configuration, streaming input requirements, error handling patterns, and example implementations.

source.title: Subagents in the SDK - Claude Docs
source.description: Programmatic and filesystem-based subagent definition using agents parameter, AgentDefinition configuration including description, prompt, tools, and model fields, context isolation, parallelization benefits, tool restrictions, automatic and explicit invocation patterns.

source.title: Slash Commands in the SDK - Claude Docs
source.description: Slash commands in Claude Agent SDK including built-in commands (/compact, /clear), discovering available commands, sending commands, creating custom commands with frontmatter, arguments, bash execution, file references, and namespacing.

source.title: Agent Skills in the SDK - Claude Docs
source.description: Agent Skills in Claude Agent SDK including filesystem-based Skill definitions, settingSources configuration, allowed_tools setup, Skill locations (project, user, plugin), creating SKILL.md files, tool restrictions, discovery, testing, and troubleshooting.

source.title: Tracking Costs and Usage - Claude Docs
source.description: Token usage tracking in Claude Agent SDK including steps, message IDs, usage reporting, deduplication rules, cost calculation, cache tracking, parallel tool handling, cumulative usage, and billing implementation examples.

source.title: Todo Lists - Claude Docs
source.description: Todo lifecycle states (pending, in_progress, completed, removed), automatic creation triggers, monitoring todo changes via message streams, real-time progress tracking, TodoWrite tool usage patterns, TypeScript and Python SDK implementation examples.

source.title: Plugins in the SDK - Claude Docs
source.description: Plugin loading from local paths, plugin structure (commands, agents, skills, hooks, MCP servers), path specifications, verifying installation via init messages, namespaced command usage, complete TypeScript and Python examples, troubleshooting.

source.title: Building agents with the Claude Agent SDK \ Anthropic
source.description: Building agents with Claude Agent SDK covering design principles, agent feedback loop (gather context, take action, verify work), agentic search, subagents, tools, bash, code generation, MCP integrations, and testing practices.

source.title: Equipping agents for the real world with Agent Skills \ Anthropic
source.description: Agent Skills architecture, SKILL.md structure with YAML frontmatter, progressive disclosure across three context levels, bundling additional files, code execution capabilities, development best practices, security considerations for installing skills.

source.title: Enabling Claude Code to work more autonomously \ Anthropic
source.description: Claude Code autonomous features including VS Code extension, enhanced terminal interface, Claude Agent SDK, checkpoints for state management, subagents for parallel tasks, hooks for automation, and background task execution.
